query: MATCH (la {esco__language:'en'})<-[:dct__description]-(o:esco__Occupation)-[:esco__isOptionalSkillFor|esco__isEssentialSkillFor]-(s2:esco__Skill)-[:skos__broaderTransitive]->(bg2:skos__Concept) where bg2.uri in $skillList WITH { NumberOfMatches : COUNT(distinct bg2), o:o, Description: la.esco__nodeLiteral } as occupationMatches WITH { Occupations: [val in collect(occupationMatches) where val.NumberOfMatches >= (case when val.NumberOfMatches < $minimumMatchingSkills THEN val.NumberOfMatches else $minimumMatchingSkills end)] } as filteredMatches UNWIND filteredMatches as mat1 UNWIND mat1.Occupations as mat2 RETURN { matchingOccupations: collect({uri:mat2.o.uri, occupation:mat2.o.skos__prefLabel, jobProfileTitle:mat2.o.skos__prefLabel, jobProfileUri:mat2.o.uri, jobProfileDescription:mat2.Description, matchingEssentialSkills:0, matchingOptionalSkills:0, socCode:9999, totalOccupationEssentialSkills:mat2.NumberOfMatches, totalOccupationOptionalSkills:0, lastModified:mat2.o.dct__modified})} as results
